summary: Moderate air pollution forecast valid from Tuesday 21 December to end of Tuesday 21 December GMT
description: Continuing overcast and cloudy on Tuesday with a very light breeze.<br/><br/>Early on, a relatively clean North Sea air-feed is forecast. From late afternoon it's expected to give way to an easterly airflow which will have passed at low altitude over urban and industrial areas on the continent. This later air-feed may contain a higher particulate load and as a result we may reach 'Moderate' particulates by evening.<br/><br/>Air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>Ozone<br/>Sulphur Dioxide <br/>
disclaimerText: This is for learning purpose and does not reflect real data source. See https://next.github.com/projects/flat-data for Flat Data Info
